TopicTitle: How to switch the time back to Earth days?

Articles.Content:
How do I switch the elapsed time to Earth days rather than Kerbin?

Edited April 25, 2014 by NERVAfan
"answered" tag
You can do it in the Settings menu I believe. If not you can manually alter settings.cfg
Thanks! I didn't realize this was an option.

Yes, this is possible in the settings menu under the General Tab, third option down.

For those willing to edit the settings.cfg it is possible that way too by setting "KERBIN_TIME = False" around line 31.
